soma.perception.observer.name: soma.perception.observer
soma.perception.observer.description: This organ will be responsible for monitoring and observing changes in the file system. It will periodically scan the file system, detect new files, modified files, and deleted files, and publish these events to the event bus. The observer will also handle any exceptions that occur during scanning and log them appropriately.

soma.memory.journal.name: soma.memory.journal
soma.memory.journal.description: Critical system component required by other organs. This organ was discovered as a missing dependency (original: soma.memory.journal). Implement it with a global start() function.

soma.visualization.dashboard.name: soma.visualization.dashboard
soma.visualization.dashboard.description: Critical system component required by other organs. This organ was discovered as a missing dependency (original: soma.visualization.dashboard). Implement it with a global start() function.

soma.analysis.learning.name: soma.analysis.learning
soma.analysis.learning.description: Critical system component required by other organs. This organ was discovered as a missing dependency (original: soma.analysis.learning). Implement it with a global start() function.

soma.analysis.prediction.name: soma.analysis.prediction
soma.analysis.prediction.description: The prediction organ will be responsible for integrating advanced predictive analytics to provide proactive recommendations for system maintenance and optimization based on file system trends. It will subscribe to insights and predictions published by the learning organ, process these insights to extract relevant information, apply predictive models to forecast future changes, and generate actionable recommendations. The prediction organ will publish recommendations back to the event bus for further action or visualization by other organs such as the dashboard.

goals.description: I must be able to perceive the file system.
I must have a visual dashboard.
Optional: Integrate machine learning algorithms to analyze trends and anomalies in the file system data, enabling predictive insights.
Integrate advanced predictive analytics to provide proactive recommendations for system maintenance and optimization based on file system trends.
